dt-api.name: searchPanes.container()
dt-api.summary: Returns the node of the panes container.

type.description: Returns the node of the panes container.

dt-api.description:
This method provides the ability to return the node of the container that is storing all of the SearchPanes.
As it is a getter it does not take any arguments

example.title: Get the node of the Container of the panes:
